long_description: The Stream Machine Lighted Bocce Ball set lets you bocce by day or bocce by night. Embedded LED lights make semi-translucent balls glow in the dark when activated; simply twist the screw-cap to turn the light on or off. Virtually indestructible polymer withstands high impact without damage to the balls or LEDs. User-replaceable AG10 button-cell batteries are preinstalled. The Stream Machine Lighted Bocce Ball set includes 8 bocce balls, 1 white jack ball, a nylon carrying case, measuring string, tape measure and instructions.
short_description: The Stream Machine Lighted Bocce Ball set lets you bocce by day or bocce by night.
